title: Window Shade, 2009-17-3, 1938–1939
provenance: Gift of Doris Duke Charitable Foundation; window shade was one of six commissioned by Doris Duke for theatre in Hollywood Wing at Duke Farms.
creditline: Gift of Doris Duke Charitable Foundation
description: Hawaii shows a female dancing the Hula on a pedestal. She is surrounded by tropical motifs including palm tree, dolphins, pineapple, tropical fish, and volcanic mountains. Located beneath her are a figure on a surfboard and three bowls of poi.  Hawaii is the birthplace of the hula dance and surfing.
